title: Collar, mid-18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Techique: embroidery on plain weave; edged with metal lace
description: Long collar made of pieces of embroidery, lined with white silk and edged with metal lace; the embroidery shows flowers in colored silks and bands and ornaments in metal thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Collar, mid-18th century.Medium: silk, metal thread
Techique: embroidery on plain weave; edged with metal lace. 1915-34-1.
